Language Services for Professionals
Welcome
Learn More

Services

Translation

We have a decade of experience in the humanities translating academic, business, educational and technical texts to and from Spanish, English and Japanese. Find out more.

Copy-editing

We have helped leading professionals and academics in the humanities communicate their ideas, concisely and effectively. Find out more.

Consulting

When your success depends on communicating effectively, culture and language matter. We can help you make personal and professional connections across languages and values. Contact us for a quotation.

How It Works

  • Get In Touch

    Drop us a line! We will reply with some questions and your answers will help us create a formal quotation tailored to your needs.

  • Request a Quotation

    After we receive your answers, we will reply within two business days with a formal quotation. Find out more about our fees.

  • Hire Our Services

    Once you accept our quotation, we will send you a job contract within two business days.

  • Sign the Contract

    E-mail to us a signed copy of the job contract. We will start working on your text right away!

  • The text
    is
    ready

Pricing

The following are our minimum prices and are presented only as a reference.

Translation

Language Standard Academic /
Technical
English to Spanish 12 yen* - 19 yen* -
Spanish to English 12 yen* - 19 yen* -
Japanese to English 11 yen** - 22 yen** -
Japanese to Spanish 12 yen** - 23 yen** -

*Per word in the original text. **Per character in the original text.
All services require a minimum charge of 4,000 yen.

Copy-editing

Technical
English 4 yen* - 6 yen* -
Spanish 5 yen* - 7 yen* -

*Per word.
All services require a minimum charge of 4,000 yen.

We are a team of freelance translators, educators and authors who provide personalized texts in close communication with you. We feel impassioned by writing, languages and learning, and are committed to preserving your intention and voice.

  • Privacy Policy

Privacy Policy

This privacy policy discloses the privacy practices for interlylanguageservices.com. This privacy policy applies solely to information collected by this web site. It will notify you of the following:

  1. What personally identifiable information is collected from you through the web site, how it is used and with whom it may be shared.
  2. What choices are available to you regarding the use of your data.
  3. The security procedures in place to protect the misuse of your information.
  4. How you can correct any inaccuracies in the information.

Information Collection, Use, and Sharing  We are the sole owners of the information collected on this site. We only have access to/collect information that you voluntarily give us via email or other direct contact from you. We will not sell or rent this information to anyone.

We will use your information to respond to you regarding the reason you contacted us. We will not share your information with any third party outside of our organization other than as necessary to fulfill your request.

Unless you ask us not to, we may contact you via email in the future to tell you about specials, new products or services, or changes to this privacy policy.

Your Access to and Control Over Information  You may opt out of any future contacts from us at any time.

You can do the following at any time by contacting us via email:

  • See what data we have about you, if any.
  • Change/correct any data we have about you.
  • Have us delete any data we have about you.
  • Express any concern you have about our use of your data.

Security  We take precautions to protect your information. When you submit sensitive information via the web site, your information is protected both online and offline. Only employees who need the information to perform a specific job (for example, billing or customer service) are granted access to personally identifiable information. The computers/servers in which we store personally identifiable information are kept in a secure environment.

Orders We request information from you on our quotation form and to hire our services. This information is used for billing purposes and the signing of our job contract. If we have trouble in the process of delivery, billing or payment, we'll use this information to contact you.

Updates Our Privacy Policy may change from time to time and all updates will be posted on this page.

If you feel that we are not abiding by this privacy policy, you should contact us immediately via email.
